response.overview: This film tells a story about fireflies and many creatures that are on the verge of extinction due to humans’ extensive deforestation and continuous destruction of the ecological environment, increasing selfishness and greed, triggering a full-scale counterattack by the fireflies elves Thousands of thousand-year-old trees began to cry, the peacock bamboo forests continued to make strange noises, the water storage in the rice fields instantly dried up, a series of peculiar strange things happened frequently in the small town, and people fell into an era of extreme panic. In the end, A college student born in the town of Firefly changed everything with love. He brought eco-tourism projects to the village, which not only protects nature, but also breeds and develops more vegetation and ecological projects. He uses practical actions to make people Understand the importance of environmental protection, and let the firefly elves calm down their anger.
response.title: 萤火虫之恋
